name: v1.7.1
body: * Move focus to `trigger` instead of simply blur()ing #419

name: v1.7.0
body: * Adds `container` option #368

name: v1.6.1
body: - Prevents Node.js environment from throwing an error

name: v1.6.0
body:
- Adds `Clipboard.isSupported()` static method #355
- Prevents scroll jump on iOS when using `data-clipboard-text` #369
- Prevents keyboard from opening on iOS when using `data-clipboard-target`

name: v1.5.16
body: - Ensures that event delegation works with multiple documents (a page with iframes)

name: v1.5.15
body: - Removes [Babel loose mode](http://www.2ality.com/2015/12/babel6-loose-mode.html)

name: v1.5.14
body:
- Updates `delegate` package which removes two external dependencies
- Prevents React and Angular tests from failing #274

name: v1.5.13
body: - Prevents page from scrolling after using `data-clipboard-text` on iOS #320

name: v1.5.12
body: - Fixes a bug that unable to remove fake event listener

- Fixes a regression caused by #194 at `v1.5.9`
  - Changes fake element position from `fixed` to `absolute` #250
- Fixes a remove event handler that was not being called

name: v1.5.10
body:
- Removes error message when target/text attributes are `null`, `undefined`, or `false`. This is particularly useful when using [functions](https://github.com/zenorocha/clipboard.js#advanced-options) #148 #154 #207 
- Throws error when disabled or readonly attributes are used on target element #41 #200

name: v1.5.9
body:
- Upgrades to Babel 6 #190
- Fixes fake element position #194

name: v1.5.8
body:
- Resets invisible `<textarea>` box model #179 
- Prevent auto-zooming on iOS devices #180

name: v1.5.7
body: - Fixes a bug when updating Babel 5 to 6

name: v1.5.6
body:
- Adds support for RTL #161
- Fixes the "unexpected token function" bug on IE9 and Android #170

name: v1.5.5
body:
- Adds support for text selection on iOS Safari for `<input>` and `<textarea>` elements
- Fixes a bug where non-editable elements were being focused, causing elements to not be selected on Firefox

name: v1.5.4
body: Fix a bug where events have already been bubbled up #119

name: v1.5.3
body: - Removes the need for Browserify users to transpile ES6 code

name: v1.5.2
body: - Removes the need for Webpack users to transpile ES6 code

name: v1.5.1
body: - Fixes regression on `v1.4.3` that caused multiple elements to not be selected

name: v1.5.0
body:
- Allows HTML elements to be passed in the constructor #25
- Fixes regression on `v1.4.3` that caused selected text to not be returned on editable elements

name: v1.4.3
body: - Adds support for text selection on iOS Safari for `<input>` and `<textarea>` elements

name: v1.4.2
body: - Fix "Discontiguous selection is not supported" error on Chrome #17

name: v1.4.1
body: - Prevent Firefox < 41 scrolling to bottom of page when using `text` attribute #74

name: v1.4.0
body:
- Add `destroy` method #24 
- Fix bower import for those who wiredep #64
- Add support for multiline value when using `text` attribute #38 

> Thanks @kmalakoff @arve0 @calvincorreli @max-cross

name: v1.3.1
body:
Adds CommonJS support on Node environments #15 #19

> Thanks to @mauriciosoares

name: v1.3.0
body:
- Adds UMD support #13 #16

> Thanks to @mauriciosoares

name: v1.2.0
body:
- Improves `data-clipboard-target` to support any selector instead of ID https://github.com/zenorocha/clipboard.js/commit/beab7bc087bb555c68818027d51dc52f516ee29a
- Adds support to set action/target/text via function https://github.com/zenorocha/clipboard.js/commit/b842987292796abdee0d05e6fe0a21584c9a4ad7

> Thanks to @eduardolundgren

name: v1.0.0
body:
Hello :earth_africa: 

> Thanks to @eduardolundgren @jaydson @gauntface @Nevraeka

name: v1.1.0
body:
- Includes `data-clipboard` prefix on each data attribute in order to avoid conflicts #5
  - `data-action` > `data-clipboard-action`
  - `data-target` > `data-clipboard-target`
  - `data-text` > `data-clipboard-text`

> Thanks to @mauriciosoares
